files.patch:
@@ -38,1 +38,1 @@
-        default: 'linux-x64, linux-x86, linux-x64-variants, linux-cross-compile, macos-x64, macos-aarch64, windows-x64, windows-aarch64, docs'
+        default: 'linux-x64, linux-x86, linux-x64-variants, linux-cross-compile, macos-x64, macos-aarch64, windows-x64, windows-aarch64, windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt, docs'
@@ -68,0 +68,1 @@
+      windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt: ${{ steps.include.outputs.windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt }}
@@ -120,0 +121,1 @@
+          echo "windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt=$(check_platform windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt windows x64)" >> $GITHUB_OUTPUT
@@ -255,0 +257,13 @@
+  build-windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt:
+    name: windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt
+    needs: select
+    uses: ./.github/workflows/build-windows.yml
+    with:
+      platform: windows-x64
+      msvc-toolset-version: '14.29'
+      msvc-toolset-architecture: 'x86.x64'
+      extra-conf-options: '--enable-jvm-feature-link-time-opt'
+      configure-arguments: ${{ github.event.inputs.configure-arguments }}
+      make-arguments: ${{ github.event.inputs.make-arguments }}
+    if: needs.select.outputs.windows-x64-viscpp-link-time-opt == 'true'
+

@@ -174,0 +174,3 @@
+  else ifeq ($(call isCompiler, microsoft), true)
+    JVM_CFLAGS_FEATURES += -GL
+    JVM_LDFLAGS_FEATURES += -LTCG:INCREMENTAL
